code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     deleteDirectory("target/messages").     super.setUp(). }

@Test public void testCheckFiles() throws Exception {     // wait a little for the files to be picked up and processed     Thread.sleep(5000).     File file = new File("target/messages/emea/hr_pickup").     assertTrue("The pickup folder should exists", file.exists()).     assertEquals("There should be 1 dumped files", 1, file.list().length).     file = new File("target/messages/amer/hr_pickup").     assertTrue("The pickup folder should exists", file.exists()).     assertEquals("There should be 2 dumped files", 2, file.list().length). }
